Class InsomniaGUI

  • java.lang.Object
    • InsomniaGUI
  • public class InsomniaGUI
extends java.lang.Object
    this class has all the gui and some actions but it's gonna change into multiple classes in the future

    2020
    Author:
    Moujan Mirjalili
